Q0: Dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) gene panel (multi-gene genetic testing for hereditary DCM).
Q14_detail: 81439 (Hereditary cardiomyopathy, genomic sequence analysis panel, must include sequencing of at least 5 cardiomyopathy-related genes)
Q17: To submit the claim, ensure the following steps are followed: 1) Document that the patient has idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy with no identifiable cause after conventional diagnostic studies, 2) Confirm that the patient has a first-degree relative (her father) who died suddenly at age 39, meeting the family history criteria, 3) Include clinical notes from the cardiologist recommending the test, 4) Submit the appropriate CPT code (81439) for the hereditary cardiomyopathy panel, 5) Attach any required documentation of family history and clinical findings, 6) If required by the plan, include evidence of genetic counseling or specialist referral, 7) Submit through the standard claims process for Aetna Choice POS II.
